title: Land in Homagama | Watareka
details:
You can now invest in a premium plot of land located near Homagama city, in a tranquil setting that is rich in nature. A variety of plots are available, with convenient access to supermarkets and other facilities. By investing in a plot of land in this peaceful location, you are ensuring that your entire family will enjoy a brighter future as well as all the benefits of a comfortable home and beautiful surroundings.

- 300 meters to High-level Road
- Walking distance to Watareka Kanishta Vidyalaya
- Pipe borne water, Electricity, Bank loan facilities & easy payment schemes.
